markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Quick Runner's Shirt](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1303)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 43

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This light shirt is made of thin fabric embroidered with arrangements of winged feet.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> envision;  **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** Your feet feel lighter, allowing you to move with greater speed. You Stride twice and gain a +10-foot item bonus to your Speed during those Stride actions.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 5"
pfs="Standard"
>
Quick Runner's Shirt
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 43

**Price** 150 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 12"
pfs="Standard"
>
Quick Runner's Shirt (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 43

**Price** 1,750 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

When you Activate the shirt, you Stride three times.
name: Quick Runner's Shirt (Greater)
